logentry.msg: Added teaser image upload to dossier

logentry.msg: Added display of dossier to article and teaser image upload to dossier

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: Mimetype is now the empty string and no longer the string "FIXME:". However it is still preferable to fix it properly.

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Added elements bold, emphasize, superscript, subscript, itemizedlist, listitem, ulink, table, tbody, row, entry

logentry.author: jbigalke
logentry.msg: coding to evaluate doctypes, i.e. added line: creator.init(creatorNode)

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Corrected problem with footer date in live and with display

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Dossier teaser on section pages is working correctly now

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: Arbitrary files can be saved now

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Draw comma only if there is a date

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Changed Dossier part of navigation (more than one Dossier possible)

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Changed/Corrected HTML according to Thomas Poppenwimmer

logentry.msg: Changed/Corrected HTML according to Thomas Poppenwimmer

logentry.msg: Changed/Corrected HTML according to Thomas Poppenwimmer

logentry.msg: changed html, simplified to one footerfor all documents

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: serverName and serverPort added to RequestParamAction

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: differentiate between authoring and live for logo href

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: RSS improved and no redirect within Authoring

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: day and month added to Schema

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: Xopus documentation improved a bit and added to Help

logentry.author: egliwyona
egliwyona
logentry.msg: Make sure the images are inserted after the xpath by configuring it in the parameters for the file-upload action.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: When writing the back the xml file (using an XMLWriter) after having inserted the media tag do not use the pretty-print formatter. Use a very simple and plain formatter that leaves the xml intact as it was.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * Make sure the red dot is inserted after the p. * The xpath of the p after which the image is to be inserted was calculated wrongly. We cannot simply use position() but instead have to use count(preceding-sibling::p).

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: If add the dublin core description as the image caption if it is non-empty.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: Return null in corner cases (e.g. the upload file is null or the parameter uploadFile is not of type FilePart).

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: We no longer use the Default implementation of the file-upload action but a unipublic specific extension of it.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * Code cleanup * New method getImagePath that constructs the image path. The default implementation simply concatenates the sitemapPath and uploadDirName. Subclasses can specify this further and add other schemes as to where they think images should be stored.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: The filename is no longer simply takes from the identifier + the extension of the uploaded file. If the identifier is non-empty this method is still used. Otherwise the name of the uploaded file is taken.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: There is now a new variable insertImageBefore which specifies if the media tag is inserted before or after the xpath. This variable can be specified in the sitemap (as a parameter to the action).

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * Renamed the configuration parameters of the file-upload action from "parameter" to a more sensible name, e.g. "images-dir" * Added an additional configuration parameters "insert-image-before".

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * Changed the logger for file-upload. You can now specify your own logging target in logkit.xconf for the file-upload action. * The pipeline for upload now does a redirect back to the referer if the action was succesfull.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: The referer is now passed back to the sitemap for redirecting purposes.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * The "invalid byte 2 of 3-byte UTF-8 sequence" exception is fixed now. It was a problem with using a plain Filewriter instead of using an XMLWriter to write the xml back to disk. * only the filename is inserted in the media tag as per felix request. * the media tag is now inserted before the imageXPath.

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: removed, was only good for playing around with

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: Links and a lot of other stuff fixed

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: Location and Local Info added to Authoring

logentry.author: michicms
logentry.msg: Article XSLT of Live version fixed

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: * Implemented the requirement that the uploaded file as it is stored on the server should be named using the identifier given by the user in the request + the extension of the original uploaded file. * General cleanup of debug statements.

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: Added documentation templates to the methods.

logentry.author: felixcms
logentry.msg: Commented out browser selection for article

logentry.author: egliwyona
logentry.msg: General cleanup and completion. The documentid is now passed through as a request parameter. The file is uploaded with the name of the "identifier" parameter.
